fullplot: The shooting of "Je vous presente Pamela" (may I introduce Pamela) begins. This is the story of en English married wife falling in love and running away with the father of her French husband. Will be simultaneously shown the shooting, the behavior of the people (including the technical team) on the set, and a part of their private life (a factor of complication)...
plot: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.
title: Day for Night
